2284  void SetRecordingsLifetimeValues(const std::vector<std::pair<int, std::string>>& recordingsLifetimeValues)
2285  {
2286  m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize = 0;
2287  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize && i < sizeof(m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues); ++i)
2288  {
2289  m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].iValue = recordingsLifetimeValues[i].first;
2290  strncpy(m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].strDescription, recordingsLifetimeValues[i].second.c_str(),
2291  sizeof(m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].strDescription) - 1);
2292  ++m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize;
2293  }
2294  }
2295 
2297  std::vector<std::pair<int, std::string>> GetRecordingsLifetimeValues() const
2298  {
2299  std::vector<std::pair<int, std::string>> recordingsLifetimeValues;
2300  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize; ++i)
2301  {
2302  int value = m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].iValue;
2303  std::string str = m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].strDescription;
2304  recordingsLifetimeValues.push_back(std::pair<int, std::string>(value, str));
2305  }
2306  return recordingsLifetimeValues;
2307  }
2309

2311  PVR_ADDON_CAPABILITIES* m_capabilities;

4555

6709  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetChannels(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
6710  ADDON_HANDLE handle,
6711  bool radio)
6712  {
6713  std::vector<PVRChannel> channels;
6714  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetChannels(radio, channels);
6715  for (auto iter : channels)
6716  {
6717  instance->toKodi->TransferChannelEntry(instance->toKodi->kodiInstance, handle, iter);
6718  }
6719  return error;
6720  }

6722  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetChannelStreamProperties(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
6723  const PVR_CHANNEL* channel,
6724  PVR_NAMED_VALUE* properties,
6725  unsigned int* propertiesCount)
6726  {
6727  std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> propertiesList;
6728  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetChannelStreamProperties(channel, propertiesList);
6729  *propertiesCount = 0;
6730  for (auto iter : propertiesList)
6731  {
6732  strncpy(properties[*propertiesCount].strName, iter.first.c_str(), sizeof(properties[*propertiesCount].strName) - 1);
6733  strncpy(properties[*propertiesCount].strValue, iter.second.c_str(), sizeof(properties[*propertiesCount].strValue) - 1);
6734  ++*propertiesCount;
6735  if (*propertiesCount > STREAM_MAX_PROPERTY_COUNT)
6736  break;
6737  }
6738  return error;
6739  }

7000  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetRecordingStreamProperties(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7001  const PVR_RECORDING* recording,
7002  PVR_NAMED_VALUE* properties,
7003  unsigned int* propertiesCount)
7004  {
7005  std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> propertiesList;
7006  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetRecordingStreamProperties(recording, propertiesList);
7007  *propertiesCount = 0;
7008  for (auto iter : propertiesList)
7009  {
7010  strncpy(properties[*propertiesCount].strName, iter.first.c_str(), sizeof(properties[*propertiesCount].strName) - 1);
7011  strncpy(properties[*propertiesCount].strValue, iter.second.c_str(), sizeof(properties[*propertiesCount].strValue) - 1);
7012  ++*propertiesCount;
7013  if (*propertiesCount > STREAM_MAX_PROPERTY_COUNT)
7014  break;
7015  }
7016  return error;
7017  }

7142  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetStreamProperties(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7143  PVR_STREAM_PROPERTIES* properties)
7144  {
7145  std::vector<PVRStreamProperties> cppProperties;
7146  PVR_ERROR err = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetStreamProperties(cppProperties);
7147  if (err == PVR_ERROR_NO_ERROR)
7148  {
7149  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cppProperties.size(); ++i)
7150  {
7151  memcpy(&properties->stream[i], static_cast<PVR_STREAM_PROPERTIES::PVR_STREAM*>(cppProperties[i]), sizeof(PVR_STREAM_PROPERTIES::PVR_STREAM));
7152  ++properties->iStreamCount;
7153 
7154  if (properties->iStreamCount >= PVR_STREAM_MAX_STREAMS)
7155  {
7156  kodi::Log(ADDON_LOG_ERROR, "CInstancePVRClient::%s: Addon given with '%li' more allowed streams where '%i'",
7157  __func__, cppProperties.size(), PVR_STREAM_MAX_STREAMS);
7158  break;
7159  }
7160  }
7161  }
7162 
7163  return err;
7164  }
